name: Pantocrator
description:
This game was developed for the 2018 Global Game Jam. The theme for the jam was 'transmission' (How we interpreted that theme is up for interpretation :D). 

The goal of the game is to survive for as long as possible. 

Controls ActionControlMove WASDAttack Left ClickPulse WaveRight ClickDash Space Credits

Art

  • Renie Aganchyan

Programming

  • Angel Georgiev
  • Pavel Pavlov
  • Simo Iliev

Sound Effects and Music

  • Teodor Zgurovski
